original_text:
For then I would have lain down and been quiet;
    I would have slept; then I would have been at rest,
korean_text: 그렇지 아니하였던들 이제는 내가 평안히 누워서 자고 쉬었을 것이니

sentences.original_text: For then I would have lain down and been quiet
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 누워 조용히 했을 것이라

sentences.original_text: then I would have been at rest
